completeListOfAbilities.name: Gauntlet
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
6-hit group ranged BRV attack + single-target HP attack
BRV attacks distributed based on number of enemies
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
Deals 20% HP damage to non-targets
All targets: 2 turns No cheating! (prohibits BRV restoration [BRV increase displayed in green digits]、 buffs)
Self: 6 turns Water God's Blessing

ailments.name: Water God's Blessing
ailments.desc: Water God's Blessing: Raises party's MAX BRV、 ATK (does not stack)

ailments.name: No cheating!
ailments.desc: No cheating!: Prohibits BRV restoration、 buffs

passives.name: Materia Hunter
passives.desc:
When using BRV Attack:
• Low chance of inflicting 2 turns SPD Down I
• Low chance of slightly raising own SPD for 2 turns
*Also applies to abilities changed from BRV Attack
passives.short_desc: Materia Hunter: Inflicts SPD Down、 raises own SPD

passives.name: Buff Attack Speed
passives.desc: Moderately raises ATK、 SPD with active buffs
passives.short_desc: Buff Attack Speed: Raises ATK、 SPD

passives.name: Snatch Extension
passives.desc:
Snatch use +2

When using Snatch:
 • After increasing own BRV、 reduces target's BRV to 1/2
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 4; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Random buff copied from target、 extended 1 turn becomes random buff stolen from target、 extended 1 turn
 • Triggers additional HP attack after use
passives.short_desc: Snatch Extension: Boost to Snatch

passives.name: All Buff Boost
passives.desc: Slightly raises party's MAX BRV with active buffs
passives.short_desc: All Buff Boost: Raises party's MAX BRV

passives.name: I don't need this Extension
passives.desc:
I don't need this use +2

When using I don't need this:
 • Inflicts 3 turns INT BRV Down I、 MAX BRV Down I、 ATK Down I、 DEF Down I to all targets before transferring debuffs
 • Grants allies BRV based on own MAX BRV
 • Triggers 2-hit group ranged BRV attack + group HP attack after granting allies BRV; deals proportionate HP damage to each target
 • Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Removes 1 debuff from each ally

While Phew、 perfect! active:
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (increases BRV based on MAX BRV before HP attack)
passives.short_desc: I don't need this Extension: Boost to I don't need this

passives.desc: Slightly raises party's MAX BRV、 ATK
passives.short_desc: Destruction Resonance: Raises party's MAX BRV、 ATK

passives.desc: When using All BRV Copy:\n • Adds effect that slightly raises party's MAX BRV for 4 turns

passive.name: All BRV Copy Growth
passive.short_desc: All BRV Copy Growth: Boost to All BRV Copy

passive.name: Double Snatch
passive.desc: Self: 1 turn MAX BRV Up I with Snatch

passive.name: Ninja Girl Schtick

Upon using I don't need this:

 • Phew、 perfect! boost、 duration+

 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ while Phew、 perfect! is active
passive.short_desc: Ninja Girl Schtick: Boost to I don't need this

passives.desc: While equipping EX+ weapon Magic Shuriken (VII)+ or passive ability Piece of Cake!! Extension:\n • Slightly raises MAX BRV、 moderately raises ATK

passives.name: Phew、 perfect! & Water God's Blessing Buff Starting
passives.desc: 6 turns Phew、 perfect!、 Water God's Blessing at start of quest
passives.short_desc: Phew、 perfect! & Water God's Blessing Buff Starting: Phew、 perfect!、 Water God's Blessing at start of quest

passives.name: Gauntlet BRV Hit Plus Force Spread Up++
passives.desc:
When using Gauntlet:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 9; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Moderately increased HP damage to non-targets

While Water God's Blessing active:
 • BRV Attack、 BRV Attack+ become BRV Attack++ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; slight cumulative BRV damage boost over BRV Attack+; grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV)
 • HP Attack、 HP Attack+ become HP Attack++ (increases BRV based on MAX BRV before attack; ranged BRV attack + HP attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%)
passives.short_desc: Gauntlet BRV Hit Plus Force Spread Up++: Boost to Gauntlet; enables BRV Attack++、 HP Attack++ while Water God's Blessing active
